entry.title: My Second Article
entry.summary: Even the happiest person you know may have days when they feel discouraged, overwhelmed, or depressed. entry.content: Even the happiest person you know may have days when they feel discouraged, overwhelmed, or depressed. Adulting is hard, and sometimes we just can’t help but feel like we are drowning in responsibilities, stress, and worry. Heck, even teenagers and young children have moments when they could use some extra encouragement! When that happens, something as simple as a few words of encouragement can be enough to put a smile back on our faces and remind us that things will eventually be better.
